api_list.api_description: Estimate the age for a batch of names.

required_parameters.name: names
required_parameters.description: A list of first names (up to 10) to estimate ages for.

optional_parameters.name: country_id
optional_parameters.description: The country code to improve estimation accuracy across all names.

api_list.api_description: Retrieve the favicon for a specified domain. Optionally, specify the size of the favicon image.

required_parameters.name: domain
required_parameters.description: The domain to retrieve the favicon from.

optional_parameters.name: sz
optional_parameters.description: A size hint for the favicon (e.g., 128, 256). Defaults to None, which returns the default size (usually 16x16).

query: I have a list of names: Ethan, Olivia, and Sophia. What are their estimated ages? Also, can you provide the favicon for the website 'example.com' in size 128x128?
